mapper.select: SELECT o.order_cd orderCode, ui.name customerName, prod.prod_nm productName, mct.m_ct_nm middleCategory, o.refund_date refundDate, o.refund_cnt refundCount, o.refund_amt refundAmount, dc.detail_name state FROM tb_order o JOIN ( SELECT detail_code, group_code, detail_name FROM tb_detail_code WHERE group_code = 'STTcd' ) dc ON o.STTcd = dc.detail_code LEFT JOIN tb_userinfo ui ON ui.loginID = o.loginID LEFT JOIN tb_scm_product prod ON prod.product_cd = o.order_cd LEFT JOIN tb_scm_m_category mct ON mct.m_ct_cd = prod.m_ct_cd WHERE STTcd IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7) ORDER BY o.order_date DESC LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) tot_cnt FROM tb_order WHERE STTcd IN (3, 4, 5, 6, 7)

SELECT o.product_cd productCode, prod.prod_nm productName, mct.m_ct_nm middleCategory, sup.supply_nm supplyName, o.order_date orderDate, o.refund_date refundDate, wh.warehouse_nm warehouseName, o.refund_cnt refundCount, NOW() refundDirectionDate, o.refund_amt refundAmount FROM tb_order o LEFT JOIN tb_scm_product prod ON prod.product_cd = o.order_cd LEFT JOIN tb_scm_m_category mct ON mct.m_ct_cd = prod.m_ct_cd LEFT JOIN tb_scm_supply sup ON sup.supply_cd = prod.supply_cd LEFT JOIN tb_scm_warehouse wh ON wh.warehouse_cd = prod.warehouse_cd WHERE o.order_cd = #{orderCode} ORDER BY o.order_date DESC
